title: Wall Streeters Hunkering Down for More WFH
itunes:title: Wall Streeters Hunkering Down for More WFH
description:
New York-Presbyterian Hospital President and CEO Dr. Steven Corwin provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Trade and Globalization Reporter Shawn Donnan discuss the story “America’s Economy Faces a Zombie Recovery, Even With Vaccine.” Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane talks about Wall Street workers hunkering down for more months of working at home. And we Drive to the Close with John Traynor, CIO at People's United Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
